title: @Riot A humble request from a player about to hit 1000 wins
body:
I am only a few games away from my 1k wins and was told by some friends that sometimes you can get to play a game with Riot? I know we are busy with LCS but I was really hoping maybe I could play with some of the casters as my fiance and I watch LCS every weekend and I love listening to them.

Thanks for giving me many years of fun with my fiance (league is one of our favorite things to do together!). The video about league couples was really touching for us too. I cant think of a more awesome thing then to share my 1000th win with the people that have literally shaped uncountable hours of my life and helped me to create so many amazing friendships.

My fingers are crossed!

replies.body:
Hello Wfury!

First off, congratulations on almost reaching 1000 wins, that's awesome! Secondly, it's so great to hear how big a role both League of Legends and the LCS has played in your's and your fiance's lives. It brings a smile to my face knowing we've brought one to yours.

I'll extend a friend invite to Wfury so that we can figure out a time to play out your 1000th win (and I'll gather a few of the other casters)!

Best,
Riot Dash

omg omg omg! I got your friend invite! I am going out to dinner with my Dad (I cant wait to tell him!) Im sooo excited OMG!

Thank you guys sooo much for keeping this visible you are awesome!
I love when people that are this excited about the game get to do something like this. Have fun :D
For some reason I'm excited too now O: , have fun with that!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Dash,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=BfA2mLWd,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-06-30T20:59:38.423+0000)

Hey Dash, any chance I could get a game with you and some of the casters too to celebrate my 1000 wins? i made a post or two back when I hit 1k but never got a response :( Guess it was super busy at the time lol

Also, congrats on 1000 Wfury :)
always a scrub trying to get in on someone elses birthday party...
Like +1
He should have to win against you guys. Dont give up the win easily.
Lots of respect for you Dash, that is a really cool thing for you and fellow casters to do :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Dash,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=BfA2mLWd,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-06-30T20:59:38.423+0000)

holy crap that's pretty surprising. Most of the time I see these, it's people from RIOT that I have never heard of. To see Dash do this for someone, that's pretty epic

Dash I just want to say you are so awesome for doing this. I love it when the more well-known Rioters reach out to the community. Big fan of the entire LCS crew over there. Keep up the good work. I also want to compliment you on your hilarious intro on W4D2 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?t=140&v=IRbzAgIqOVA ) at 2:10 in video

Keep Phreak contained ;)

-The Lexer
This is why I love Leauge of Legends.
Now that's how to make a player feel great. Good job Riot, player support done right.
Thats what im talkin bout! Im glad the internet was wrong and you aren't a bunch of joy swallowing trolls that snatch babies in the night, lol!
Yay :D

RITO PLEASE! Everyone should upvote this until it gets seen by riot. This is the first time ive seen a give me something special request that wasn't $$$$$$$$$$$ Its nothing more than a game invite. If you guys think you are really so famous that you can't play one game with a fan I'll be really sad.
Thanks for the help Toilette ^.^
i agree +1

the 1000th win thing isn't actually all that uncommon.
Though you don't always end up with well know rioters.

Come on Rito, do it.
http://media.giphy.com/media/wi8Ez1mwRcKGI/giphy.gif
http://cdn2.crushable.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/Marry-me-GIF-Arrested-Development-Maeby.gif
lawl
http://img01.deviantart.net/7777/i/2011/318/5/7/please_kitty_needs_yo_help_by_hikari2314-d4g5cay.png
Good luck bud! And congrats on your Fiance! I wanna get my girlfriend to play league wish me luck!

so.. my gf just reached 1k wins, i myself am comfortably sitting on my 3.2k win today :D (ahem* no life)
mean i can haz 3 game with riot + casters :D
lol no just 3 riot casters or maybe 4 with your girlfriend and you combined

Saw this on the boards and I just had to comment. First off congrats on reach 1000 wins! That is quite an achievement you have reached regardless of everyone else says. Now before I go to the secondly, it was only during URFitationals that I noticed how cool Dash was. So I started watching his stream and really started to enjoy it. So after seeing him respond to this kind of message in the boards and actually playing with Wfury, ups my respect for him not only as a rioter, but as a human being and it is stuff like this that remind me that not everything in the league community is complete crap. So for that I thank you Dash! Keep it up man and I'm rooting for you on your stream to reach your goal. ~Peace
Upvoted, best of luck to you man!! I hope you get your special game :)
BUMP DA DA DUM!
congratulations, OP, I hope you enjoyed your game with them :)

We are going to play some time next week.When I wrote this post I had about 12 wins to go and thought that it would take a few days to hear back. Especially because Dash and the rest of the casters are super busy with LCS. Dash is being really patient and waiting (he even left me on his friends list so I could let him know when im at 999) These guys are amazing and I'm an even bigger fan then before!

> [{quoted}](name=Wfury,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=BfA2mLWd,comment-id=001e0000,timestamp=2015-07-03T02:52:46.713+0000)

That's awesome to hear. I'm glad you got your wish. They do seem like pretty decent folk from all I've seen, albeit most of that is 'on-stage'. PRepare yourself for puns of damage though.
@Wfury Everyone seems to assume immediately that you're a guy. XD
Haha its okay! It doesn't bother me. Were all just people sharing a passion. It doesnt really matter if we are a  guy or girl :)
I have 1004 wins, I didn't know this was a thing {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} . But gratz on everything and gl hf!

This is on of the rare times I go out of my way to say something to devs. I am surprised firstly and very happy you would consider this request. Cheers to the Riot team for caring and congrats to the op on the, soon to be, best 1000th win ever!
upvoted
That feel when you blow past your 2000th win without even noticing. {{item:3070}}
We did it! \(^.^)/
Glad he got his wish. :^)
Aww, man! The casters are freaking awesome. I now have to strive to hit 1000 wins........ So I too, can play a game with some casters. Although, I'm silver 2, and will get rekt. But oh well! #Goals

I thought they did this at 2000 wins.
